comments:
(Just tried this on 3.2 M2 / I20050923-1000)
Reproduce steps:
1. Right click on project -> Export -> Eclipse Product
2. In Configuration field, type anything (I'm partial to "abc")
3. Click on Browse button and get IllegalArgumentException (stack trace below)

Error 2005-10-04 01:08:02.269 Path must include project and resource name: /.product

Oh oh!  Janek, the "Configuration" and "Source Compatibility" fields have the
same mnemonic.  Do you mind changing that too? :)
